awd_titl_txt: Improvement of Materials Testing Laboratory for ConstructionManagement Technology Program
awd_abstract_narration: This project develops a soils science and technology course and                 incorporates soils testing equipment in the materials testing                   laboratory for its laboratory component.  The course is part of                 the Construction Management Technology program of the                           University of Maryland Eastern Shore, and introduces students                   to the nature of soils and illustrates how soil materials may                   influence certain construction operations.  The course is                       divided into two parts.  Part I is an introduction to soil                      materials in conjunction with the testing methods, and seven                    experiments are performed.  The tests follow closely the ASTM                   or AASHTO standard test procedures.  Part II deals with                         earthwork in the construction contract and reviews construction                 items that involve soils operation.
